inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: tremors since a year ago, first in right hand while holding something

inclusion.criterion: Diagnostic criteria of essential tremor, pure dystonic tremor and tremor associated dystonia
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability to comply with all study procedures
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Agree to not drink caffeine or alcohol for 48 hours before participating in the protocol
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Botulinum toxin treatment < 3 months prior to visit
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has used illegal drugs within the past 6 months based on history
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has more than 7 alcoholic drinks a week in the case of a woman and 14 alcoholic drinks a week in the case of a man
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Abnormal findings on neurologic exam (other than tremor and dystonia in patient group)
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: jaundice, hepatosplenomegaly and hypotonia of the upper limbs

exclusion.criterion: Has had a brain tumor, a stroke, head trauma, epilepsy or a history of seizures
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has major depression or any major mental disorders (axis I disorders)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a neurologic disorder other than tremor or dystonia
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wilson disease, confirmed by high liver copper concentration. He has aggressive behavior according to his parents' explanation.
